title: HTC Touch HD
overview: The HTC Touch HD redefines mobile functionality with its sleek design, high-resolution touchscreen, and powerful hardware, offering an unmatched multimedia and business experience.
details: 3.8-inch WVGA touchscreen with crisp high-definition clarity.
Ultrafast 3.5G connectivity for seamless browsing and streaming.
Integrated GPS and A-GPS support for navigation.
Advanced HTC TouchFLO™ 3D control interface for smooth navigation.
Supports multiple audio and video formats for entertainment on the go.
Expandable storage via microSDHC card (up to 32GB supported).

specifications.Connectivity: HSDPA/WCDMA, Quad-band GSM, Wi-Fi 802.11 b/g, Bluetooth 2.0
